content: in from either edge with 8 stitches between them see pic 2 eyes can also be embroidered on or beads or buttons used instead thank you so much for making from my pattern please remember you do not have to use my notes they are just there for your use if you should need or want them please feel free to contact me via my facebook page ravelry account or instagram feed should you require any assistance i hope you loved making your gingerbread men 10 www facebook com/elli crochet copyright
